text: Quality restaurant hidden here in Fort Mill / Indian Land.  I enjoyed a fresh local seafood entree with seasonal vegetables.  Very affordable with great service and local atmosphere.  I will be back!

This is now called Tavern on the Lake and is under new management and new kitchen crew.  Should I generate a new business?

I will do that and write the review.

This restaurant, now called Tavern on the Lakes, is largely unknown outside of Sun City and the local golfing community. The food and service is excellent. 

The restaurant hired a new chef around July 4, 2016, so the older reviews are obsolete.
